      static void setSeed(int seed)
      To avoid the correlation among continuous seeds, this method uses a fixed seed to generate a sequence of random integers and takes the ith random integer to be the actual seed, where i is the given seed.

    • Method Detail

      • setSeed

        public static void setSeed(int seed)
        To avoid the correlation among continuous seeds, this method uses a fixed seed to generate a sequence of random integers and takes the ith random integer to be the actual seed, where i is the given seed.
        Parameters:
        seed - an non-negative integer, which is actually the run number

      • getSeed

        public static int getSeed()
        Return the run number instead of the actual seed.
        Returns:
        the run number instead of the actual seed

      • findBestProviderIdForInnovator

        public static int findBestProviderIdForInnovator(Innovator innovator)
        Return the best provider's id for the given innovator.
        Parameters:
        innovator - an innovator object
        Returns:
        the best provider's id for the given innovator

      • removeRandomElementFromSet

        public static <T> T removeRandomElementFromSet(java.util.HashSet<T> set)
        Randomly remove an element from the given set and return that removed element.
        Parameters:
        set - a set of objects
        Returns:
        the randomly removed element from the set
